LocaleResource.Value: Adds Facebook authentication to the store.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
How to set up Facebook authentication:

  • Create a new app on Facebook of type Consumer.
  • Enter the access data (App-ID & App-Secret) in the form below.
  • Enter the URL listed below in My app > Facebook Login > Settings > Valid OAuth Redirect URIs.
  • Enter your domain in the advanced settings of the created APP in the Domain Manager.
  • Activate automatic registration in the shop's customer settings if you want to register externally authorized visitors automatically.

LocaleResource.Name: RedirectUri.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The OAuth Redirect URI to be entered on Facebook.
